TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICodeGenerator

summary.span: 定义用于生成代码的接口。

span.span: Defines an interface for generating code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 和1.1 中，代码提供程序包含 、、和 的实现。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, code providers consist of implementations of , , , and . 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]中，、和 方法已过时， 和 的方法可在 类中直接使用。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the , , and methods are obsolete, and the methods of and are directly available in the class. 应在代码提供程序实现中重写这些方法，而不调用基方法。You should override those methods in your code provider implementation and not call the base methods. 编译器的开发人员可以实现此接口，以允许用户以特定语言动态生成代码。Developers of compilers can implement this interface to allow people to dynamically generate code in a particular language. 这可用于多种用途，例如创建代码生成向导、创建包含可调试内容的动态程序集，以及使用嵌入代码的模板化文档（如 ASP.NET）。This can be used for a variety of purposes, such as creating code-generating wizards, creating dynamic assemblies with content that can be debugged, and for templated documents with embedded code, such as ASP.NET. 实现通常是通过调用 的 方法来获取的。An implementation is typically obtained through a call to the method of .

MemberSignature.Value: public string CreateEscapedIdentifier (string value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string CreateEscapedIdentifier(string value) cil managed
Public Function CreateEscapedIdentifier (value As String) As String
public: System::String ^ CreateEscapedIdentifier(System::String ^ value);
abstract member CreateEscapedIdentifier : string -> string

param.name: value
param.span: 要为其创建转义标识符的字符串。

span.span: The string to create an escaped identifier for.

summary.span: 创建指定值的转义标识符。

span.span: Creates an escaped identifier for the specified value.
The escaped identifier for the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 测试标识符是否与保留关键字或语言关键字冲突，如果是，则返回具有特定语言转义代码格式的等效名称。 tests whether the identifier conflicts with reserved or language keywords, and if so, returns an equivalent name with language-specific escape code formatting. 这称为转义标识符。This is referred to an escaped identifier. 该转义标识符将包含相同的 `value`，但会添加转义码格式设置，以使标识符有别于关键字。The escaped identifier will contain the same `value` but will have escape code formatting added to differentiate the identifier from the keyword. 两个实现示例在 `value` 前面带有 "@"，或将 `value` 与 "[" 和 "]" 括号。Two implementation examples are preceding the `value` with "@" or bracketing the `value` with "[" and "]".

permission.span: 完全信任直接调用方。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 部分信任的程式碼無法使用此成員。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

permission.span: 完全信任继承者。

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 部分受信任的代码不能继承此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

MemberSignature.Value: public string CreateValidIdentifier (string value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string CreateValidIdentifier(string value) cil managed
Public Function CreateValidIdentifier (value As String) As String
public: System::String ^ CreateValidIdentifier(System::String ^ value);
abstract member CreateValidIdentifier : string -> string

param.name: value
param.span: 要为其生成有效标识符的字符串。

span.span: The string to generate a valid identifier for.

summary.span: 为指定的值创建有效标识符。

span.span: Creates a valid identifier for the specified value.
A valid identifier for the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 测试标识符是否与保留关键字或语言关键字冲突，并返回一个不冲突的有效标识符名称。 tests whether the identifier conflicts with reserved or language keywords, and returns a valid identifier name that does not conflict. 返回的标识符包含相同的 `value`，但是，如果它与保留关键字或语言关键字冲突，则会添加转义码格式设置，以使标识符有别于关键字。The returned identifier will contain the same `value` but, if it conflicts with reserved or language keywords, will have escape code formatting added to differentiate the identifier from the keyword. 通常情况下，如果需要修改该值，则返回的值前面带有下划线 "_"。Typically, if the value needs modification, value is returned preceded by an underscore "_".

permission.span: 完全信任直接调用方。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 部分信任的程式碼無法使用此成員。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

permission.span: 完全信任继承者。

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 部分受信任的代码不能继承此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

public: bool IsValidIdentifier(System::String ^ value);
abstract member IsValidIdentifier : string -> bool

param.name: value
param.span: 用来测试是否为有效标识符的值。

span.span: The value to test for being a valid identifier.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示指定的值是否是当前语言的有效标识符。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified value is a valid identifier for the current language.

returns.span: 如果 参数是有效标识符，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the parameter is a valid identifier; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法测试标识符是否有效。This method tests whether an identifier is valid. 在派生类中实现 时，请将方法设计为测试传递给它的值，并且仅当该值符合语言的规则并且不与关键字冲突时才返回 `true`。When implementing in a derived class, design the method to test the value passed to it, and return `true` only if the value fits the rules of the language and does not conflict with a keyword.

param.name: supports
param.span: 要为其测试生成器的功能。

span.span: The capabilities to test the generator for.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示该生成器是否支持指定的 对象表示的语言功能。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the generator provides support for the language features represented by the specified object.

returns.span: 如果支持指定的功能，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the specified capabilities are supported; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以一次使用多个 标志来调用此方法，以便通过将一组相应的功能标志与二进制 "或" 运算符（|）相联接来测试一组功能。This method can be called with a number of flags at once to test for a set of capabilities by joining a set of appropriate capability flags together with a binary "Or" operator (|).

MemberSignature.Value: public void ValidateIdentifier (string value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ValidateIdentifier(string value) cil managed
Public Sub ValidateIdentifier (value As String)
public: void ValidateIdentifier(System::String ^ value);
abstract member ValidateIdentifier : string -> unit

span.span: The identifier to validate.

summary.span: 如果指定的值不是一个有效的标识符，将引发异常。

span.span: Throws an exception if the specified value is not a valid identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的标识符根据方法实现无效，则此方法将引发异常，而不是返回值。Rather than returning a value, this method throws an exception if the specified identifier is not valid according to the method implementation. 通常情况下，异常是 。Typically, the exception is an . 此方法使实现此方法的代码生成器可以基于无效标识符的值生成信息性错误消息。This method enables a code generator that implements this method to produce an informative error message based upon the value of an invalid identifier.

span.span: The identifier is not valid.

permission.span: 完全信任直接调用方。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 完全信任继承者。

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.
